query_context: top link tracking tools to measure marketing distribution channel performance for onboarding (MMP platforms)

layer_1_structural_framework.consensus_intent: Signal a comprehensive, up-to-date listicle to match user intent.
layer_1_structural_framework.optimized_pattern_template: The [Number] Best Mobile Measurement Partners (MMPs) in [Year]

layer_1_structural_framework.content_requirement: Must define what a Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP) is and its core function in attributing installs, measuring campaign performance, and detecting fraud.
Must link to each tool covered, plus a section on 'Key Features to Consider' or 'Evaluation Criteria'.
Each listed tool must have its own H2/H3 section detailing its unique value proposition, key features, and any available quantitative data.
Must include a dedicated section explaining how to choose an MMP, covering criteria like 'Accurate Attribution', 'Fraud Prevention', 'Deep Linking Capabilities', and 'Pricing'.

Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP).primary_definition: Third-party platforms that help app marketers attribute installs, measure campaign performance across various channels, and detect fraud.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Key metrics tracked include Cost Per Install (CPI), Lifetime Value (LTV), and Retention Rate.

AppsFlyer.primary_definition: A market-leading Mobile Measurement Partner known for its comprehensive attribution suite and large market share.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Boasts an impressive 72% market share among the top 10,000 apps.
Offers cross-platform attribution including Mobile, CTV, PC & Console.

Branch.primary_definition: An MMP platform that specializes in deep linking technology to create seamless user experiences from web-to-app and across platforms.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Their 'Journeys' product for web-to-app banners can increase app open rates by up to 2x.
Excels in deep linking, which is vital for seamless user onboarding experiences.

Adjust.primary_definition: An MMP known for its strong focus on fraud prevention, security, and automation within its analytics suite.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Unique value proposition is an all-in-one suite combining measurement, cybersecurity, and automation.

Singular.primary_definition: An MMP platform that provides unified marketing data and analytics with a key feature of cost aggregation.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Primary value proposition is unified marketing analytics through cost aggregation.

mandatory_inclusions: A clear definition of 'Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP)'.
A numbered list of at least 5-8 top MMP tools, including AppsFlyer, Branch, and Adjust.
Specific, quantifiable data points (e.g., market share percentages, performance uplift).
A section on key evaluation criteria: attribution accuracy, fraud prevention, deep linking, and integration capabilities.
Mention of future year (e.g., 2025, 2026) in the title and body to signal freshness.
negative_constraints: Avoid overly broad discussions of 'marketing analytics' without a specific focus on mobile app attribution.
Do not list tools without explaining their unique value proposition or key differentiator.
Avoid presenting content as a simple list without an evaluative or comparative framework.
